mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(result1) as reson1 ,COUNT(result2) as reson2 ,COUNT(result3) as reson3 ,COUNT(result4) as reson4 ,COUNT(result5) as reson5 ,COUNT(result6) as reson6 FROM MEMBER_OUT

SELECT rm.reservation_num ,CONCAT(rm.reservation_date,' ',reservation_time) AS reservation_date ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by reservation_num) AS num ,reservation_person_name ,reservation_person_count ,reservation_cancel ,reservation_member_id ,reservation_guest_num ,reservation_email ,CONCAT(dinning_num,' 번 테이블') AS dinning_num ,restaurant_num FROM RESERVATION rm JOIN ( SELECT reservation_num,reservation_date FROM RESERVATION WHERE reservation_date > date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) rs ON rm.reservation_num = rs.reservation_num;
SELECT notice_num , notice_subject , notice_content , notice_readcount , DATE_FORMAT(notice_date, '%Y년 %m월%d일 %H:%i') as notice_date , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by notice_num) as num FROM NOTICE

SELECT product_num ,product_name ,product_price ,product_info ,product_release ,product_category_name ,ifnull(favorite_count,0) AS favorite_count ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY product_num) AS num FROM PRODUCT_CATEGORY c JOIN (SELECT p.product_num ,product_name ,product_price ,product_info ,product_release ,product_category_num ,favorite_count FROM PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_num,count(favorite_num) as favorite_count FROM FAVORITE GROUP BY product_num) f ON p.product_num = f.product_num) a ON c.product_category_num =a.product_category_num

SELECT product_num ,product_name ,product_price ,product_info ,product_release ,product_category_name ,p.product_category_num ,product_main_img ,product_main_img_real_file ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by product_num) as num FROM PRODUCT p JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY c ON p.product_category_num = c.product_category_num WHERE product_num = #{product_num}

SELECT review_num , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by review_num) as num , review_content , order_num , r.product_num , product_name , review_star , DATE_FORMAT(review_date, '%Y년 %m월%d일 %H:%i') as review_date , member_id , review_image FROM REVIEW r JOIN PRODUCT p ON r.product_num = p.product_num

SELECT review_num , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by review_num) as num , review_content , order_num , r.product_num , product_name , review_star , DATE_FORMAT(review_date, '%Y년 %m월%d일 %H:%i') as review_date , member_id , review_image FROM REVIEW r JOIN PRODUCT p ON r.product_num = p.product_num WHERE review_num = #{review_num}

SELECT event_num , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by event_num) as num , DATE_FORMAT(event_date, '%Y년 %m월%d일 %H:%i') as event_date , event_subject , event_content , event_image , event_image_real_file FROM EVENT

SELECT question_num ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by question_num) as num ,product_num ,q.member_id as member_id ,member_name ,question_answer ,IF(ISNULL(question_answer),'답변대기','답변완료') as question_is_answer ,DATE_FORMAT(question_date, '%Y년 %m월%d일 %H:%i') as question_date ,question_content ,secret FROM QUESTION q join MEMBER m ON q.member_id = m.member_id WHERE question_date > CONCAT(YEAR(now())-1,'-',DATE_FORMAT(question_date, '%m-%d %H:%i'))

SELECT question_num ,q.product_num ,product_name ,m.member_id as member_id ,member_name ,question_answer ,IF(ISNULL(question_answer),'답변대기','답변완료') as question_is_answer ,DATE_FORMAT(question_date, '%Y년 %m월%d일 %H:%i') as question_date ,question_content ,IF(ISNULL(question_answer_date),'',DATE_FORMAT(question_answer_date, '%Y년 %m월%d일 %H:%i')) as question_answer_date FROM QUESTION q JOIN MEMBER m ON q.member_id = m.member_id JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.product_num = q.product_num WHERE question_num= #{question_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE QUESTION SET question_answer = #{question_answer}, question_answer_date = now() where question_num = #{question_num};
mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE result_mon AS ( SELECT 1 AS rnum UNION ALL SELECT rnum + 1 FROM result_mon WHERE 12 > rnum ) SELECT CONCAT(r.rnum, '월') as mon , ifnull(m.cnt, 0) as cnt FROM result_mon r LEFT JOIN (SELECT MONTH(out_date) AS mon , count(out_num) as cnt FROM MEMBER_OUT WHERE out_date LIKE CONCAT(year(now()),'%') GROUP BY out_date) m ON r.rnum = m.mon;
SELECT * FROM RESTAURANT WHERE restaurant_num = (SELECT restaurant_num FROM ADMIN WHERE admin_id = #{sId})

WITH RECURSIVE result_year AS ( SELECT YEAR(now()) -4 AS rnum UNION ALL SELECT rnum + 1 FROM result_year WHERE YEAR(now()) > rnum ) SELECT CONCAT(rnum,'년') as rnum ,ifnull(salary,0) as salary FROM result_year r left join (SELECT YEAR(order_date) AS year ,SUM((product_count*product_price)) AS salary FROM USER_ORDER GROUP BY YEAR(order_date)) y ON r.rnum = y.year;

WITH RECURSIVE result_mons AS ( SELECT 1 AS rnum UNION ALL SELECT rnum + 1 FROM result_mons WHERE 12 > rnum )
SELECT CONCAT(rnum,'월') AS rnum ,ifnull(sales,0) AS sales FROM result_mons r LEFT JOIN (SELECT MONTH(order_date) as mons ,SUM((product_count*product_price)) as sales FROM USER_ORDER WHERE YEAR(order_date) = IF(#{year}=0,YEAR(now()),#{year}) GROUP BY MONTH(order_date)) y on r.rnum = y.mons;
